name: Cathatos: Back To Hell
description:
Cathatos, the Grim Reaper's cat, got summoned to the human world. If he ever wants to see his master again, he must go through his nine cat lives...... Maybe there's a way to end this quickly.

Controls are on the wall to the left!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Alex Fillion - Animation, Environment
Etienne Bourdages - Character art, Environment
Daphnée Émond-Préfontaine - Shaders, Trim textures, Tech stuff
Léonard Oest O'Leary - Programmation
Anne-Julie Gagné - 2D art, Environment
Maëlig Beaupérin - 2D art, Environment

Cinematic: 

Objectives spoilers :
- Train
- Toaster
- Vending machine
- Beehive
- Microwave
- Fall damage
- Covid
- Shrödinger
- Intoxication (3 deadly fruits)

Song: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OD8HYH1ZpUM
